title: GET_CURRENT_TAB_ID response format
details: The GET_CURRENT_TAB_ID message handler uses the new response format { success: true, data: { tabId } } for consistency with content.js expectations. The legacy format { success: true, tabId } is deprecated and should not be used. Error responses should also use the data wrapper: { success: false, data: { tabId: null }, error: '...' }.
